item.title: Hunchbacked old man: What is Greed's Limit?
item.description: Have you ever heard the captivating tale of the **Hunchbacked old man (혹부리 영감)**, a classic Korean fairytale that holds timeless lessons about greed and fate? As someone who grew up with these enchanting stories, I can tell you that few tales capture the imagination and offer such profound wisdom as the story of 혹부리 영감. It’s a narrative that goes far beyond a simple moral, diving deep into the human psyche and questioning the very nature of desire.
